channel.title: 2025-10-29 10:30:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam
channel.description: Recent content in 2025-10-29 10:30:00 +0000 UTC on Srikanth Perinkulam

item.title: 29 Oct 2025 10:30
item.description:
Reorganized my Trilium Notes a bit. Over time I started dumping notes in there and somewhere it all went a bit wayward. I really need to start using it as a proper knowledge base. The good thing is most content that I refer to frequently is all in there. This along with my Signal ‘Note-to-self’ are my go-to spaces.

I’d like to read more blogs that are not tech related. Mostly driven by my curiosity in the tech space, I’ve somehow gotten into this bubble of tech-adjacent blogs. Would be nice to pop out a bit. Maybe I should explore powRSS a bit? I’ve also noticed I lean towards people who have their own personal domain. Maybe it’s a sign of some sort of commitment towards actually owning their writing?

Thinking if I want to get a nice digital sketch book. Or I should just re-purpose that old kindle? There are times I just don’t want to ‘write’. Some things are probably better just sketched out. I’ve tinkered with the Sketches app before. Maybe i’ll just port that over to the kindle one of these days…

Google seems to be making all moves to prevent sideloading apps in Android. I think it’s time I shift gears and look at other alternatives out there.

Zen browser looks real neat. Should give it a spin one of these days.

Nothing like a mildly thawed frozen Papaya…ðŸ”—
item.content:encoded:
Reorganized my Trilium Notes a bit. Over time I started dumping notes in there and somewhere it all went a bit wayward. I really need to start using it as a proper knowledge base. The good thing is most content that I refer to frequently is all in there. This along with my Signal ‘Note-to-self’ are my go-to spaces.

I’d like to read more blogs that are not tech related. Mostly driven by my curiosity in the tech space, I’ve somehow gotten into this bubble of tech-adjacent blogs. Would be nice to pop out a bit. Maybe I should explore powRSS a bit? I’ve also noticed I lean towards people who have their own personal domain. Maybe it’s a sign of some sort of commitment towards actually owning their writing?

Thinking if I want to get a nice digital sketch book. Or I should just re-purpose that old kindle? There are times I just don’t want to ‘write’. Some things are probably better just sketched out. I’ve tinkered with the Sketches app before. Maybe i’ll just port that over to the kindle one of these days…

Google seems to be making all moves to prevent sideloading apps in Android. I think it’s time I shift gears and look at other alternatives out there.

Zen browser looks real neat. Should give it a spin one of these days.

Nothing like a mildly thawed frozen Papaya…ðŸ”—
